titleStmt.title: James F. Robinson to the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky
CWG7900

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Executive Office
Frankfort Feby 26. 1863
Gentlemen of the Senate:

I nominate for your advice and consent the following persons as Notaries Public for the Counties named, to wit:
S. B. Vance for Henderson County
S. K. Sneed " " "
Jno. Y. Brown " " "
L. M. Bruce " Henry "
Jno. N. Mattingly " Jefferson "
F. Wise " Kenton "
Byron Bacon " " "
Wm T. Owen " McLean "
T. O. Shackelford " Shelby "
F. Wise, Kenton "
J. R. Smith Harrison
J. F. Robinson

Senate
Message
Notaries Public
Confirmed
Feby 27. 1863
